website_summaries.verdict: Choose this supplement if you prefer a high amount of vitamin C per dose; otherwise consider other options on our list.
pros: Powerful formula provides 1000 milligrams of vitamin C per capsule
Made with bioflavonoids for effective absorption
Reasonable price makes them a good value
cons: Capsules are quite large and hard to swallow
Contain titanium dioxide color and gelatin

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using these for years for my family
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these capsules absorb much more easily than hard pressed tablets. I take one every night and two if I was in a social situation where I had caffeine later ( it neutralizes the caffeine so I can sleep). If I sense a wee bit of sniffle or I’ve been around a lot of ill folks I ramp up to 5 a couple of times a day.... that has been a terrific buffer for me... totally sickness free winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kenaston

customer_reviews.title: ingridients/ Titanium dioxide color.
customer_reviews.text: I did not check went a bought this vitamin all the ingredients, I open my bottle today and as I read additional ingredients it has "titanium Dioxide color, something that if you inhale can cause burn, cancer etc... it says if you ingested is not a problem, if this happen in your nose I can not imagine what will happened in my stomach or colon. I do not understand why you can not leave only natural stuff in products. I open the bottle so it is one that it is lost, my fault for not reading all the information. I won't buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Gelatin capsules
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price. However there should be more explicit labeling for the gelatin capsules. I am pescatarian and do my best to avoid beef and poultry in my products. So discovering that the capsules used are made out of gelatin was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: shmeeden

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Puritan's Pridee supplements for about 15+ years now and have always been happy with their quality
customer_reviews.text: NO Rose Hips, hooray! Rose Hips inhibit my warfarin so it doesn't work as well. I have been using Puritan's Pridee supplements for about 15+ years now and have always been happy with their quality. It was double good to find them on Amazon as I was able to order them and another product and they both shipped together.
customer_reviews.author: Sequin38

customer_reviews.title: Easy to  Swallow 🤩
customer_reviews.text: These Vitamin Cs are the best. The moment I took two I started feeling more energetic. They open your appetite so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Nadjababy1

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value feeling better already
customer_reviews.text: I wil make this my standard Vit. C. It is a great value and from a very highly regarded company.
customer_reviews.author: Old Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again...
customer_reviews.text: Good for price and wife loves them! If she remains happy, I'm allowed to live another day...
customer_reviews.author: Nasty Jack Nasty

customer_reviews.title: large size pill not particularly hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared though this is a large capsule . If one has a swallowing problem or difficulty with capsules you may want to skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love PP products. High quality as well as quantity for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M Côté/GypsySoulSeed

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Came with a ton and it’s easy to take! Can’t complain!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love this supplement
customer_reviews.text: Can tell a difference in my allergy symptoms when I do not take this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gause

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product that I’m very delighted to use daily!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Alford

customer_reviews.title: Fine product
customer_reviews.text: They seam to be a quality product, and are helpful to your immune system. Glad I tried them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: They totally work
customer_reviews.text: Although the pills are a little big they are easy to swallow but the most important thing to me is the help my glaucoma totally great product
customer_reviews.author: ClaireMerrie

customer_reviews.title: Doubts about this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have my doubts about the 1000mg quality that they said it's on a capsules.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT

customer_reviews.title: Quality Vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my daily pill/supplement last fall and for the first time in as far back as I can remember, I haven't gotten sick this winter. It certainly seems to be a quality product. Well done Puritan's Pride!
customer_reviews.author: John Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: It helps to boost my immune system. Very good product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1939

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The product contains Titanium Dioxide Color. When I called Puritan's Pride to ask why I was told that it is added to "enhance the color." So it is strictly for cosmetic reasons. I wanted a vitamin c supplement to swallow, not to put on display. I will not be re-ordering again. The good is that there is no added sweeteners, salt, preservatives or gluten. A natural product, so why add coloring?
customer_reviews.author: pressman

customer_reviews.title: Sticker on package political? Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.text: Not understanding why this sticker was on the vitamin package? Will contact amazon to let them know my view.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Just what my MD orders! 1000 MGS per day. I love the Capsule Form. Huge Bottle Too!
customer_reviews.text: I take one 1000 MG a day capsule. No after taste. Do to a Medical Condition and my Medications I have to add to vitamins to help support my Immune System. after 2 weeks I felt like I had so much energy. Staying HEALTHY too! Great Buy and will be buying more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Swallow
customer_reviews.text: This capsule form factor is far superior to caplets and tablets, even the coated ones. Got tired of vitamin c tabs getting stuck to the inside of my throat rather than going directly to the stomach. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ValGal

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference within days.
customer_reviews.text: It’s weird, but I actually felt less inflammation after two or three days of taking this. Not sure if it was the vitamin C, but thought I’d mention it since the last brand of vitamin C did not make me feel this way. I did not make any other changes to my supplements at the time, so I attribute it to the vitamin C.
customer_reviews.author: Squinn

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my young son because he refuses to take anything chewable but will gladly swallow a pill, so these work perfectly for when he needs a bit extra vit C.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied - Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Impt to get bioflavenoids with Rose Hips, and this products provide that with the "C".
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow,  good potency
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years and they seem to abort any cold or sore throat that would seem to be starting.
customer_reviews.author: E. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like that these capsules are easy to swallow. Wish the rosehip with the C was in capsule form.
customer_reviews.author: WendySue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for a while and are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Krolik

product_meta.title: Vitamin C 1000 mg with Bioflavonoids for Immune Support by Puritan's Pride for Skin Health and Immune System Support 200 Capsules
product_meta.description: Our high quality Vitamin C product offers superior antioxidant protection in a 1000 mg capsule. It also includes 15 mg of bioflavonoids, which help your body absorb and utilize Vitamin C (Health notes).
feature_bullets: We are the manufacturer and the only authorized seller of this product
This product has been made with the highest quality ingredients available
Over 40 years in business and 19 million customers served
